title: Necklace, ca. 1880
creditline: Gift of the estate and in memory of Robert B. Noyes
description: Link necklace with clasp: twenty shaped pieces of onyx set in gold and one heart-shaped piece with gold setting and ornament with ring (possibly part of a pendant now missing).  One piece of onyx is broken.

tombstone.epitaph:
Necklace, ca. 1880.
ca. 1880. Onyx, gold.. Gift of the estate and in memory of Robert B. Noyes. 1946-50-78-a.
